= Introduction =

== Mediapool Technologien ==

*Maven - Debendency Management, Buildtool 

*Tomcat - Servlet Container

*Eclipse - IDE for the whole Project

*SVN - Version Control

*Java - Base Programm Language

*Vaadin - Web Framework

*Spring - Framework for Injektion

*Spring Roo - Framework to set up the Project

*Spring Security - Framework for Security Management

*Lucene Index - Index for better Datasearch

*JSOUP - Crawler for Data from other Pages

*MySQL - open Database

*Hibernate - Persistence Framework

*Android App SDK - Application on Mobile Phone
